item.title: 经销商数据显示，特斯拉加州注册量连续第二个季度下降
item.description: 加州新车经销商协会的数据显示，2024 年第一季度加州特斯拉汽车的注册量下降了约 8%，这是连续第二个三个月下降。【原文：Registrations of Tesla vehicles in California fell about 8% in the first quarter of 2024 for the second consecutive three-month period, according to data from the California New Car Dealers Association.】

item.title: 纽约市广播公司将年度股东大会推迟两周举行
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）已将其年度股东大会推迟两周至 6 月 5 日。【原文：New York Community Bancorp has pushed back its annual shareholders meeting by two weeks to June 5.】

item.title: 报告称，在 2024 年剩余时间内，全球上游行业将达成价值 1,500 亿美元的交易
item.description: Rystad Energy 公司的分析师在一份报告中说，在今年剩余时间里，全球上游产业可能会再发生价值 1,500 亿美元的交易，重点将转向二叠纪盆地以外的美国页岩油田。【原文：The global upstream industry could see dealmaking worth another $150 billion throughout the remainder of the year, with focus shifting to shale plays in U.S. other than the Permian Basin, analysts at Rystad Energy said in a report.】

item.title: 赫伯罗特首席执行官称预计红海危机将于今年结束
item.description: 德国集装箱航运商赫伯罗特公司首席执行官周一表示，他预计红海危机可在今年年底前得到解决。【原文：The CEO of German container shipper Hapag-Lloyd said on Monday he expects that the Red Sea crisis can be overcome before the end of the year.】

item.title: FCC 因非法共享位置数据对美国无线运营商罚款近 2 亿美元
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会对非法共享客户位置信息的美国最大无线运营商处以近 2 亿美元的罚款。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission fined the largest U.S. wireless carriers nearly $200 million for illegally sharing access to customers’ location information.】

item.title: 阿克塞尔-施普林格将把部分云应用迁移到微软的 Azure
item.description: 全球新闻出版商阿克塞尔-施普林格公司（Axel Springer）周一表示，将把其部分基于云的应用程序迁移到微软的 Azure，并与该公司合作增强其人工智能能力，以扩大双方的合作关系。【原文：Global news publisher Axel Springer will migrate some of its cloud-based applications to Microsoft's Azure and work with the firm on bolstering its AI capabilities, the companies said on Monday, as they expanded their partnership.】

item.title: S3 Partner 称，特斯拉做空者四天损失近 55 亿美元
item.description: 根据 S3 Partners 的数据，自电动汽车制造商承诺推出更多平价汽车以来，押注特斯拉股票的投资者在四个交易日内损失了 55 亿美元。【原文：Investors who bet against Tesla stock have lost $5.5 billion in the four sessions since the electric car maker promised more affordable cars, according to data from S3 Partners.】

item.title: UAW 与戴姆勒卡车公司达成的协议可能会推动阿拉巴马州的梅赛德斯工会投票
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（United Auto Workers）与卡车和公共汽车制造商戴姆勒卡车公司（Daimler Truck）签订了新的劳动合同，这很可能会在该工会在美国南部的下一个目标--组织位于阿拉巴马州的梅赛德斯-奔驰汽车装配厂--之前为工人们注入活力。【原文：The United Auto Workers' new labor contract with truck and bus maker Daimler Truck is likely to energize workers ahead of the union's next target in the U.S. South - organizing a Mercedes-Benz auto assembly plant in Alabama.】

item.title: 专家和政界人士呼吁对委内瑞拉使用加密货币的情况进行审查
item.description: 专家们周一表示，在美国下令在 5 月 31 日前结束与受制裁国家的石油交易后，委内瑞拉对数字货币的使用预计会增加，这将需要监管机构和执法部门加强审查。【原文：Venezuela's use of digital currencies, expected to increase after the United States ordered a wind-down of oil deals with the sanctioned country by May 31, will require greater scrutiny by regulators and law enforcement, experts said on Monday.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，可口可乐为价值 80 亿美元的非洲装瓶部门首次公开募股做准备
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，可口可乐公司正在为其非洲装瓶业务可能最快于明年首次公开募股（IPO）做准备。【原文：Coca-Cola is gearing up for a potential initial public offering (IPO) of its African bottling business as soon as next year, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称波音将利用债务市场融资 100 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的消息人士称，由于最畅销喷气式飞机的生产放缓，波音公司在第一季度烧掉了 39.3 亿美元的自由现金，本周一波音公司利用债务市场融资 100 亿美元。【原文：Boeing on Monday tapped debt markets to raise $10 billion, after the U.S. planemaker burned $3.93 billion in free cash during the first quarter following slowing production of its best-selling jet, sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 Tether 向大脑芯片制造商 Blackrock Neurotech 投资 2 亿美元
item.description: 加密货币公司 Tether 周一在一份声明中表示，已向 Blackrock Neurotech 投资 2 亿美元，获得这家美国脑植入公司的多数股权。【原文：Crypto company Tether has invested $200 million in Blackrock Neurotech, taking a majority stake in the U.S. brain implant company, Tether said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 美国议员就利用加密货币逃避制裁问题向拜登政府施压
item.description: 两位立法者就利用加密货币逃避俄罗斯、伊朗和朝鲜制裁的问题向拜登政府施压，询问官员可能需要哪些额外的授权来防止稳定币 Tether 等数字资产被俄罗斯和其他地方的受制裁实体使用。【原文：Two lawmakers are pressing the Biden administration on the use of cryptocurrency to evade sanctions in Russia, Iran and North Korea, asking officials what additional authorities might be needed to prevent digital assets, such as stablecoin Tether from being used by sanctioned entities in Russia and elsewhere.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利股东敦促代理顾问投票反对薪酬提案
item.description: 根据颇具影响力的代理顾问公司 Glass Lewis 的建议，摩根士丹利股东应在 5 月 23 日举行的年度股东大会上投票反对高管薪酬提案。【原文：Morgan Stanley shareholders should vote against its proposal for executive pay at the bank's annual meeting on May 23, according to a recommendation by influential proxy adviser Glass Lewis.】

item.title: ISS 建议股东投票反对贝莱德首席执行官的薪酬提案
item.description: 代理权咨询公司 ISS 周一建议股东投票反对批准贝莱德首席执行官拉里-芬克 2023 年薪酬的提案。【原文：Proxy advisory firm ISS on Monday recommended that shareholders vote against proposal to ratify BlackRock CEO Larry Fink's 2023 compensation.】

item.title: 收购规则将阻止盎格鲁集团在股东大会上就必和必拓收购案发表过多言论
item.description: 在英美资源集团周二举行的年度股东大会上，必和必拓 390 亿美元的出价将成为会议厅里的 "大象"。【原文：BHP's $39 billion bid will be the elephant in the room at Anglo American's Tuesday annual general meeting, with regulations meaning little can be said about the spurned offer.】

item.title: 美国最高法院不会审理埃隆-马斯克与美国证券交易委员会的和解争议
item.description: 美国最高法院周一拒绝审理埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）要求撤销与美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）达成的证券欺诈和解协议的部分内容，该和解协议限制这位亿万富翁就其电动汽车公司特斯拉（Tesla）发表公开声明。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Monday to hear Elon Musk's bid to throw out part of a securities fraud settlement with the Securities and Exchange Commission restricting the billionaire businessman's public statements about his electric car company Tesla .】

item.title: 麦当劳销售额增长乏力，美国快餐连锁店客流低迷
item.description: 麦当劳（McDonald's）将连续第四个季度报告销售增长连续下降，原因是即使快餐连锁店努力用超值菜单吸引低收入消费者，他们仍然对外出就餐犹豫不决。【原文：McDonald's is set to report a sequential drop in sales growth for the fourth straight quarter as low-income consumers remain hesitant about eating out even as fast-food chains battle to lure them with value menu items.】

item.title: 关于日元数十年跌势的五张图表
item.description: 日本日元周一突然跳水，这表明日本当局可能最终落实了他们几个月来发出的干预外汇市场的警告。【原文：Japan's yen saw a sudden jump on Monday, suggesting the country's authorities may have finally followed through on the FX market intervention warnings they have be making for months.】

item.title: 格拉斯-刘易斯支持 Ancora 提名的六名诺福克南方公司董事候选人
item.description: 代理顾问 Glass Lewis 建议诺福克南方公司股东投票支持 Ancora Holdings 提名的六位铁路公司董事会成员，其中包括拟任首席执行官吉姆-巴伯（Jim Barber），这是激进投资者的一次重大胜利。【原文：Proxy adviser Glass Lewis recommended Norfolk Southern shareholders vote for six of Ancora Holdings' nominees for board seats at the railroad company, including proposed CEO Jim Barber, in a big win for the activist investor.】

item.title: 旅游公司维京寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集约 13.3 亿美元资金
item.description: 旅游公司维京控股（Viking Holdings）周一表示，该公司正寻求在美国进行规模更大的首次公开募股，筹资最多可达 13.3 亿美元。【原文：Travel firm Viking Holdings said on Monday it was seeking to raise up to $1.33 billion in an upsized initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 可可价格飙升令好时、蒙代尔兹业绩备受瞩目
item.description: 好时（Hershey）和蒙代尔兹（Mondelez）国际公司本周将公布第一季度业绩报告，投资者将迫切希望了解这两家巧克力生产商计划如何应对近期可可和糖价格的飙升。【原文：Hershey and Mondelez International investors will be eager to see how the chocolate makers plan to tackle the recent surge in cocoa and sugar prices when they report first quarter results this week.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪利润增长乏力，显示出价格战的影响
item.description: 中国电动汽车（EV）制造商比亚迪周一公布了自2022年以来最微弱的季度利润增长，受电动汽车需求放缓和全球最大汽车市场上激烈价格战的影响。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle (EV) maker BYD posted its weakest quarterly profit growth since 2022 on Monday, hit by slowing EV demand and a bruising price war in the world's largest auto market.】

item.title: 对通胀持谨慎态度的美国利率期权市场为 2024 年美联储加息谨慎定价
item.description: 有担保隔夜融资利率（SOFR）期货期权显示，由于美国通胀和劳动力市场保持弹性，美联储今明两年加息四分之一个百分点的可能性较高。【原文：Options on Secured Overnight Financing Rate (SOFR) futures are showing a higher probability that the Federal Reserve could hike interest rates a quarter percentage point this year and next as U.S. inflation and the labor market remain resilient.】

item.title: 土耳其食品杂货配送公司 Getir 撤出欧洲和美国市场
item.description: 土耳其食品杂货配送公司 Getir 周一表示，它将退出欧洲和美国市场，专注于主要的土耳其市场。【原文：Turkish grocery delivery company Getir said on Monday it was withdrawing from its European and U.S. markets to focus on its main Turkish market.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：欧盟将调查梅塔公司处理俄罗斯虚假信息的情况
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一报道，欧盟监管机构预计将对 Meta Platforms 展开调查，原因是担心该公司在反击来自俄罗斯和其他国家的虚假信息方面做得不够。【原文：European Union regulators are expected to open a probe into Meta Platforms over concerns that the company is failing to do enough to counter disinformation from Russia and other countries, the Financial Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 土耳其航空公司与空中客车公司和波音公司洽谈购买 235 架飞机事宜
item.description: 土耳其航空公司董事长艾哈迈德-博拉特（Ahmet Bolat）周一表示，土耳其航空公司正在与空中客车公司和波音公司谈判购买 235 架飞机的事宜，作为其扩张计划的一部分。【原文：Turkish Airlines is negotiating with both Airbus and Boeing about buying 235 aircraft as part of its expansion plans, Chairman Ahmet Bolat said on Monday.】

item.title: 富尔顿金融公司收购倒闭的共和第一银行存款和资产后业绩大增
item.description: 富尔顿金融公司（Fulton Financial）从联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation）手中收购了 Republic First 的存款和资产，这是 2024 年美国第一家倒闭的银行，之后该公司股价周一大涨。【原文：Fulton Financial's shares jumped on Monday after it bought the deposits and assets of Republic First from the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, in what is the first U.S. bank failure of 2024.】

item.title: 尽管经济不景气，但中国人在尿布和高露洁上的花费仍在增加
item.description: 据尿布和一些高露洁牙膏制造商的高管透露，尽管消费者对中国的房地产危机和不景气的经济感到担忧，但中国购物者在这些产品上的花费还是略有增加。【原文：Chinese shoppers are spending a little more on diapers and some Colgate toothpastes, according to executives at the makers of these products, even as consumers fret about the country's property crisis and faltering economy.】

item.title: 美联储按兵不动，通胀推迟软着陆进程
item.description: 通货膨胀近期没有放缓或范围缩小的迹象，这让美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）的政策制定者们本周面临着如何描述他们下一步行动的挑战，即使在充满争议的美国总统大选进入倒计时之际。【原文：Inflation showing no recent sign of slowing or narrowing in scope leaves U.S. Federal Reserve policymakers challenged this week over how to characterize their next steps even as the countdown to a contentious U.S. presidential election continues.】
